entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
